alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 3:39PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Elko County through 415 PM PDT... At 338 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Currie, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Elko County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
